title: How to know when I'm being clickjacked - Quora

response.answer_text: Check your activity log. When viewing your profile, you should see an "Activity Log" button in the lower-left hand corner of your cover photo. It's not the same as an alert pushed to you, but it will let you know if you've done something you didn't expect. I suspect you could also develop a Facebook application that you can add to your profile which will generate notices on activity in order to get something proactive.
